1.0.name: wordpress/force-reauthentication
1.0.description: Sometimes you need to log out all the users from your site (or a single user) and force them to re-login. This plugin adds a simple action link to the standard User admin page (and the network admin page) that will forcibly log out the user the next time they interact with your site.
